Content.Text:
<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning! I'll work hard today!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I had a nice dream yesterday! That means
something good's about to happen! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I can't wait to see what it is!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like exploring places!
<PAGE>
Even the same places I've been to before. They're
different, if you go in different seasons! It's fun!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello! My cleaning's all done, so now it's
playtime! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you had lunch yet? Hope so. People get
mad when they get hungry!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What should I do for fun today?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>! You're still working
this late?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hm? You want to know what I'm doing?
<PAGE>
Well, you know how certain animals only come
out at night? I'm going on a night time
adventure!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm cleaning Dessie's spring! ♪
<PAGE>
I've been working on it even harder than usual.
Look how clean it's gonna be! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, it's nice and warm. ♪
<PAGE>
After I finish cleaning up, I'm gonna go out and
play with some friends. Whee!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Some people hate rainy days, but I don't!
There're critters that only come out in the rain,
you know!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A lot of cicadas come out in the summer! I'm
gonna find a whole new cicada species!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, I always love standing out in the rain! ♪
Come on, rain! Let it rain!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Some insects can sing, and their songs are
beautiful!
<PAGE>
They love a good, sunny day as much as we do!
♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Autumn rains are long, and they're a bit colder
than summer rains are.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't really like winter... It's harder to clean
Dessie's spring when the water's so cold.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But I won't give up! Cleaning's my job, and I'll
get it done!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you working in the snow, <MYNAME>?
You're amazing!
<PAGE>
No, I mean it! You're awesome! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, <MYNAME>! It's dangerous to go out in this
kind of weather, you know!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ah, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
You ought to stay home. It's too snowy to be
out and about!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dessie isn't here right now. She's out and about.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Creator is the one who told us all to take
care of Dessie.
<PAGE>
He's scary sometimes, but He also worries about
her a lot.
<PAGE>
In a sense, He's...overprotective.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Where did Dessie go...? I'm lonely.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Keep this under your hat, but Dessie can be a
little clumsy sometimes...
<PAGE>
I've seen her trip over nothing, or topple right
into a river...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But she's doing her best to be a goddess, and I
support her one hundred percent!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nature's critters are always so lively in the
springtime.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That means now's my chance to go out and
meet them!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There was a bee's nest on the road.
<PAGE>
I wonder if the bees set out on a journey to
make that nest. Sounds romantic in a way,
doesn't it? ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you know you can catch insects on a tree?
<PAGE>
See, insects like trees, and different insects like
different trees. Check 'em out and see what you
find!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes the sun can get a little too bright,
even for me. But there's plenty of shade around
here, so everything's fine, rain or shine!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pepita's always cooking for Dessie and the rest
of us.
<PAGE>
These days, she's been using lots of local
mushrooms.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And I love mushrooms, so that's great for me.
♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why do they call them "piggyback locusts?" Are
they friends with pigs or something?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's always a little sad when summer ends, but
I'm happy the weather's getting cooler. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The animals are happy, too. They tell me the
cooler weather's easier on them.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
In this season, you can find blueberries right on
the ground, so I don't need to go looking for
snacks. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There're lots of dragonflies in the autumn! Too
bad they're not just a little bit bigger. Then I
could go riding on them!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
*pant* *pant* It's hard to walk in deep snow.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow! So many snowballs. You know what that
means... Snowball fight! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too cold for insects to be out and about.
That's why they're taking a rest.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel like it's easier to spot insects around here.
I'm going to see if I can find one I've never met.
♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
There's a lot of poisonous mushrooms, so be
careful!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Mora ate one by mistake the other day, and you
don't wanna know what he had to go through...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Cabbage white butterflies have beautiful wings.
♪ I wish I had wings like they do!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What comes to mind when you think of
summer? Playing in rivers, right? Ever dive into
a river from a dock?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, I really do want to play in the river
sometime. It looks like fun...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But a long time ago, I got caught in a fish trap.
<PAGE>
It was kind of a shock at the time, let me tell
you...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's hard to communicate with insects... I have
almost no idea what they're talking about.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love the way the trees around here are turning
red. It's so pretty... ♪
<PAGE>
But I still say spring is prettier!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I was walking around here the other day, and I
tripped right over!
<PAGE>
I looked back and I saw this black branch.
<PAGE>
It blended right into the ground. I couldn't even
see it! Bah!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Gusto told me that someone found a dorcus
curvidens beetle around here!
<PAGE>
Whoever it was, I'm jealous. I wanna see it, too!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I wonder if the river's frozen enough to go
skating on it.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes, snowballs have other things inside
them.
<PAGE>
So when you see a snowball, throw it and break
it open!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In winter, most insects take a rest, but not all of
them. Some just keep on going!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's easier to grow spices and fruit trees in the
farm around here.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There're tea gardens around the hilltop.
<PAGE>
You get different kinds of tea leaves, depending
on when you harvest them.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, have you ever seen azure
dragonflies?
<PAGE>
They're huge, right? I keep having this dream
where I fly around on their backs.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since this place is so high up, it gets a lot of
sunshine.
<PAGE>
I'm sure the crops that grow here are happy
about that. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fruit trees that grow here tend to be more...well,
fruitful!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Insects are always so lively in summer. In fact,
some insects only come out in the summer,
period!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's easier to grow fruit trees in the farm on the
right hand side.
<PAGE>
Grapes and apples are seasonal right now, you
know. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Have you heard of a spice called a chili pepper?
<PAGE>
I hear it's so spicy that just biting into it can hurt
your mouth!
<PAGE>
I'll have to try one sometime and find out. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Autumn is kind of lonely. All those summertime
insects have gone away...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, there are a few fruit trees that can
grow in winter.
<PAGE>
Still, I hope the weather gets warmer soon!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never knew there were so many kinds of food
before I came here.
<PAGE>
Humans are culinary geniuses!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When insects fly in falling snow, does it hurt
them? Does it weigh them down? If so, I feel
bad for them.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know how to get higher-quality honey,
right? Perfume!
<PAGE>
But did you know each bee has different tastes
in perfume?
<PAGE>
Use just the right perfume, and your honey will
taste amazing! Try it out and see!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to use perfume on your honey, just
once a day is enough.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a lot of flowers here. Perfect for
attracting honey bees. They love the smell!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, have you ever tried growing
mushrooms on a log or a tree?
<PAGE>
If you sprinkle seeds over the bark, mushrooms
grow there naturally.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I asked the honey bees around here which
perfume they like!
<PAGE>
Apparently, their favorite is "Rose Seduction!"

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Some insects don't come out very often. If you
see them, you're lucky!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tall crops grow well around here! Eggplants are
in season now, by the way. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I asked the honey bees around here which
perfume they like!
<PAGE>
According to my investigation, these honey bees
prefer "Summer Memories!"

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can see lots of stag beetles in summer, but
you can see them in the autumn, too! They're
preparing for winter.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
During winter, bees take a break just like most of
us do! 
<PAGE>
Of course, they don't make honey while they're
on break, so keep that in mind.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mountain honey bees seem to like a perfume
called "Forest Whisper."
<PAGE>
Animals in the forest told me that. ♪ So I
thought I'd pass it on to you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We can't harvest honey right now, but when
spring comes, honey bees will go collect flower
nectar and start making honey all over again! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pardon me, <MYNAME>, do you know what
"root vegetables" are?
<PAGE>
Humans have all kinds of names for everything.
It's hard to keep track of them all sometimes...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm... I like this smell... ♪ Nice and relaxing.
<PAGE>
It's an herbal smell, isn't it?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, do you know how to catch
insects?
<PAGE>
You can't catch them with your hands full, for
one thing! If you're holding anything, put it away
first.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I asked Torque what "root vegetables" were.
<PAGE>
She said something about onions.
<PAGE>
So...onions and root vegetables are the same
thing?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! Have you ever heard of
watermelons?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>They're huge...they're red...and their hearts are
pitch black!
<PAGE>
Eeek! I'm scared!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Did I get you? I scared you a little bit, didn't I?
C'mon, it's summertime. Perfect time for scary
stories. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When I showed an empty cocoon to Pepita, she
got really mad at me!
<PAGE>
I totally forgot she hates insects. I really upset
her, didn't I?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What kind of food do you think about in the
autumn? Yams, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...When autumn rolls around, Pepita cooks
yams, yams, and more yams, so I can't think
about anything else.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a lot of herbs around here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ooh, maybe Dessie would like this lavender!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The songs of bell crickets are so relaxing. Every
time I hear them, I could just nod off right then
and there...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Torque told me something...
<PAGE>
Basically, she said there's a lot about the world
that I just don't know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So if you trade with a lot of people and bring in
new crops from other places, let me see them!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Around here, this field is the biggest of them all!
It's hard to run from one end to the other!
<PAGE>
Especially with this much snow on the ground...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't find any insects or animals right now. It
gets lonely when they're not around...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, are you good at fishing, by
any chance?
<PAGE>
There's a lot of fish around here. Maybe even
some I've never seen before. ♪
<PAGE>
If you catch any rare fish, please let me see!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The fish have kings who live in rivers and ponds!
<PAGE>
They're huge and amazing! And really hard to
catch!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
With the river and the paddies here, there's a lot
of water, and water attracts insects. It's the best
spot to catch them!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can grow wasabi and lotuses in paddies.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't need to water crops in paddies. Makes
it easier, doesn't it? ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a lot of fireflies flying around here.
Probably because they enjoy the river so much!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The paddies over there are drawing water from
the river.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I found a shiny coin in the river!
<PAGE>
Sweet! ♪ It's going in my collection.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear there're still rare insects somewhere out
there, still waiting to be discovered. I wanna see
them someday!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Brr... It's cold... I'll never know how fish get by
in this weather. The water's cold too, you know!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's snowing, so why aren't the paddies frozen?
Isn't that a little odd?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The insects are resting. You should too,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You're asking me what I like?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_FLAT>Anything I've never seen before, that's what! I'm
always looking for something rare and exotic.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We Nature Sprites all have our differences, but...
<PAGE>
One thing we have in common is that we all love
Dessie! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, is that <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> for me?!
Looks delicious!
<PAGE>
Ooh, yay! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, my very own <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>!
This is great! You're a good human, <MYNAME>!
♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohh, my very own <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! I
like this! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Thank you. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh... My very own <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...
assuming you got this for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Yeah, actually, I don't like these very much... I
mean...thank you.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Aww, you didn't have to get this for me... I
mean, you really didn't...
<PAGE>
But since it's a present from you, I'll take it...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Th-this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> is supposed to
be for me?! It's way too huge! I don't want it! I'm
scared!
<PAGE>
Umm...how about if I just give it to Torque?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, it's golden!
<PAGE>
Can I really have this?! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, it's gold and shiny!
<PAGE>
I love it! You're a good human. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, it's golden! Is this for me?
<PAGE>
Thank you! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, look at that golden shine!
<PAGE>
I mean, just because it's shiny doesn't mean I
WANT it, but... No, I'm sorry. Here, I'll take it.
Thanks.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You know, that golden glow is amazing and
all...
<PAGE>
But I'm just not a fan of these in general, to be
honest.
<PAGE>
Still, I mean, it's a present from you, so I'll take
it.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You know, that golden glow is amazing and
all...
<PAGE>
But I'm just not a fan of
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> in general, to be
honest.
<PAGE>
Still, I mean, it's a present from you, so I'll take
it.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Is this for me?
<PAGE>
You just gave me something, though. I'd feel
bad if you gave me too much at once.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's a rabbit! Hello!
<PAGE>
You beat me in our last race, but I've been
training since then! Let's have a rematch!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello! Thank you for being nice to me in the
forest!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, ermine! Thank you for giving me a ride!
<PAGE>
We all have a lot to thank you for, ermine!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello! All the animals of the forest are friends
of mine!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're giving me a flower? Oh, for the Flower
Fair! Thank you! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, who's that blue feather for?
<PAGE>
Well, whoever it is, they'll be very happy! Best
wishes!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You gonna give that ring to someone special?
<PAGE>
You can do it, <MYNAME>! I'm right there with
you!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, I like this ribbon!
<PAGE>
The coloring's so perfect! Yay! ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's got a nice ribbon and everything!
Thank you. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>!!
<PAGE>
I brought you a present! I hope you'll like it. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>!!
<PAGE>
It's a very special day. ♪

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Long time no see.
<PAGE>
You look good! I'm glad.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sleepy now... Time to go hit the hay.
